title: Tangy slow cooker pork roast
ingredients: ['1 large onion, sliced', '1kg boneless pork loin roast', '250ml hot water', '4 tablespoons sugar', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon ketchup', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 dash hot sauce, or to taste']
